mapper.sql: id, user_name, login_result, login_time, login_ip, os_type, version_code, version_name, platformid, gamearea_id, service_id, login_ip_area, is_third
mapper.select: SELECT platformid AS platformId, os_type AS sourceType, user_name AS userId FROM tbl_login_track WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(login_time) <= 1 AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(login_time) > 0 GROUP BY platformid, os_type, user_name;

select a.id as source_type, ifnull(b.register_population,0) as register_population, ifnull(c.login_population,0) as login_population, ifnull(d.recharge_population,0) as recharge_population, ifnull(d.recharge_count,0) as recharge_count, ifnull(d.recharge_amount,0) as recharge_amount from tbl_plat_terminal_info a left join (select os_type, count(DISTINCT(user_id)) as register_population from gp_tbl_user_info where
create_time > DATE_FORMAT('#{startDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and
create_time <= DATE_FORMAT('#{endDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
group by os_type) b on a.id = b.os_type left join (select os_type,count(user_name) as login_population from gp_tbl_login_track where
login_time > DATE_FORMAT('#{startDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and
login_time <= DATE_FORMAT('#{endDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
group by os_type) c on a.id = c.os_type left join (select source,count(DISTINCT(user_id)) as recharge_population ,sum(apply_amount) as recharge_amount,count(orderno) as recharge_count from gp_tbl_recharge_record where and status=1 and
apply_time > DATE_FORMAT('#{startDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and
apply_time <= DATE_FORMAT('#{endDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
group by source) d on a.id = d.source
